user_question: Can you help me find a Python script to scrape weather data from a website and explain how it works?
final_answer: The script can be adapted to handle different websites by modifying the HTML parsing logic to match the structure of the target websites.

steps.content: The script uses the requests library to fetch the webpage content and BeautifulSoup to parse the HTML. It extracts weather data by finding specific HTML tags and classes related to the weather information.
Can it handle different websites or just one specific?
The script can be adapted to handle different websites by modifying the HTML parsing logic to match the structure of the target websites.
